channel.title: How do I do this again?
channel.description: Hi, I sorta wanted to play a bit of minecraft again, however I do not have an account and do not wish to have one. I only play single player. I used to be able to play single player however it looks like the new launcher requires an account. Is there any way to play single player without an account?

item.title: How do I do this again?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:3, topic:537044”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=655859.msg4389881#msg4389881 date=1387077170]
I think cracked launchers still work with older versions. But if you want the new content, you have to purchase the game.
[/quote]

I want to play 1.4.6[/quote]

http://24minecraft.org/minecraft-tools/9-magic-launcher-tool-for-minecraft-147-146-145.html

Read full topic
item.source: How do I do this again?
